TEXT.TITLE: UNIVERSAL HEALTH REALTY <UHT> IN INITIAL PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Universal Health Realty Income Trust, which recently went public, said its board has declared an initial quarterly dividednd of 33 cts per share, payable MArch 31 to holders of record March 16. Reuter
